backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing user profiles, game CRUD operations with creator-based authorization, and access control using mixins for storage and authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three implemented features: removing API key requirements from image search, extending web search to video generation, and integrating web search as the primary media generation mechanism.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of frontend files including components, hooks, and utilities for chat, media generation, translation, math solving, and other AI-powered features with webkit prefixes for cross-browser compatibility.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes, including sidebar, chart, and UI component color variables.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point with comprehensive SEO meta tags, Open Graph/Twitter Card metadata, PWA manifest, JSON-LD structured data, and Apple-specific meta tags for iOS Safari.
frontend/public/demo.html: Standalone interactive demo page with dark theme styling using OKLCH colors, tabbed navigation interface, and custom CSS for cards and buttons showcasing Neroxa AI features.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining Neroxa AI app metadata, standalone display mode, theme colors, and icon configurations for 192x192 and 512x512 sizes.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt file allowing all user agents to crawl all paths on the site.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap listing nine URLs (home, chat, math, media, translation, music, art, code, games) with priorities and update frequencies for SEO.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application entry point that sets up React Query, TanStack Router with routes for all features (chat, math, media, translator, music, art, code, games), and wraps the app with theme and identity providers.
frontend/src/components/ArtCanvas.tsx: Interactive drawing canvas component with color palette, brush size controls, eraser tool, AI art idea generator chat, and artwork sharing functionality with shareable URLs.
frontend/src/components/ChatPage.tsx: Main chat page layout that combines ChatSidebar and ChatView components, handles session selection and navigation, with a close button to return to home.
frontend/src/components/ChatSidebar.tsx: Collapsible sidebar displaying chat session list with timestamps, new chat button, and session selection functionality using the useChatSessions hook.
frontend/src/components/ChatView.tsx: Chat conversation view displaying messages with user/assistant avatars, message input with send button, typing indicators, and auto-scrolling to latest messages.
frontend/src/components/DictionaryView.t: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary component that catches and displays errors with a user-friendly UI, showing error details and providing reset/reload options.
frontend/src/components/GameBrowser.tsx: Displays a searchable, filterable grid of games with tabs for all/user/AI-created games. Supports game deletion for owners and launches GamePlayer when a game is selected.
frontend/src/components/GameCard.tsx: Renders an individual game card with thumbnail, title, description, creator badge (AI/User), and a play button. Includes hover effects and click handlers.
frontend/src/components/GameModeModal.ts: Modal dialog presenting three options: play built-in games, browse community games, or create a new game. Used for initial game mode selection.
frontend/src/components/GamePlayer.tsx: Full-screen game player component that loads game code into an iframe, handles high scores via postMessage, and includes built-in game templates (Flappy Bird, Snake, etc.). Supports fullscreen mode and displays creator info.
frontend/src/components/GameStudio.tsx: Game creation interface with form fields for title, description, and HTML/CSS/JS code. Validates input, creates games via mutation, and navigates to browser on success.
frontend/src/components/GamesView.tsx: Main games view controller that manages navigation between menu, predefined games, browse, create, and playing modes. Conditionally renders GameBrowser, GameStudio, or GamePlayer based on current view state.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Application header with logo, theme toggle, home button, and sign-out functionality. Displays authenticated user's name and adapts layout for mobile screens.
frontend/src/components/HomePage.tsx: Main landing page component that displays a grid of 8 navigation cards (Math Solver, Chat, Translator, Script Writer, Music Maker, Art Creator, Media Generator, Games) with icons, descriptions, and gradient styling.
frontend/src/components/MathProblemSolve: Math problem solver component with difficulty levels (K-2 through 11-12), homework helper mode, teacher mode with concept explanations, and step-by-step solution generation using client-side evaluation.
frontend/src/components/MediaDisplay.tsx: Media search interface with tabs for images and videos, featuring web search functionality without API keys, download capabilities, and video preview dialog.
frontend/src/components/MusicGenerator.t: Music generation component supporting both AI-generated audio from text prompts and a beat pattern sequencer with kick/snare/hihat sounds, tempo control, playback, and sharing functionality.
frontend/src/components/PredefinedGameSe: Dialog component displaying a grid of 4 predefined classic games (Flappy Bird, Snake, Pong, Breakout) with emoji icons and descriptions for quick game selection.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Modal dialog for first-time user profile setup that prompts for a name and saves it using the useUserProfile hook, with loading states and form validation.
frontend/src/components/Scripter.tsx: React component that provides a chat-based script/code generator interface with syntax highlighting, copy-to-clipboard functionality, and message history using the useScriptGeneration hook.
frontend/src/components/SharedContentVie: Component for viewing shared artwork or music content via URL parameters, displaying loading states, error handling, and rendering images or audio players based on content type.
frontend/src/components/TranslatorChat.t: Translation interface component with language selection dropdowns, text input area, and translation history display using the useTranslation hook for 12 supported languages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that manages the Internet Computer actor instance with authentication, automatically recreating the actor when identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useArtIdeaGenerator.t: Hook that generates art prompt suggestions based on user input keywords (animals, landscapes, abstract, portraits, fantasy, space, flowers, food) with randomized creative ideas for each category.
frontend/src/hooks/useArtworkShare.ts: Hook for sharing artwork by generating unique IDs and share URLs, with clipboard copy functionality; backend sharing support has been removed.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioGeneration.ts: Hook that generates synthetic audio using Web Audio API, creating simple melodies based on prompt characteristics and converting AudioBuffer to WAV blobs for playback and download.
frontend/src/hooks/useCanvasDrawing.ts: Custom React hook that manages canvas drawing state and operations including mouse/touch drawing, erasing, color/brush size control, and canvas clearing with white background initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useChatSessions.ts: Manages chat sessions using localStorage with React Query, providing CRUD operations for sessions and messages, plus an AI response generator that handles greetings, math, science, and other educational topics with contextual responses.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameCatalogue.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching game catalogue data, individual game metadata, categories, and games by category from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGames.ts: Provides React Query hooks for game CRUD operations (get all, get single, create, delete) using the backend actor with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameState.ts: Manages game high scores using localStorage with React Query hooks for fetching and updating scores per game ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useImageSearch.ts: Custom hook that searches for images using the free Picsum Photos API, generating 12 random placeholder images with metadata for any search query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaGeneration.ts: Custom hook for generating images and videos from text prompts with detailed prompt analysis including colors, shapes, subjects, actions, settings, and animation properties for procedural generation.
frontend/src/hooks/useMusicShare.ts: Provides mutation hook for sharing music audio blobs with local ID generation and share URL copying functionality, though backend persistence is no longer supported.
frontend/src/hooks/useScriptGeneration.t: Custom React hook that manages script generation with mock AI responses, providing message history, loading state, and template-based code generation for React, Python, JavaScript, API, and calculator examples.
frontend/src/hooks/useSharedContent.ts: React Query hooks for fetching shared artwork and music content that currently throw errors indicating these features are no longer supported by the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useTranslation.ts: Custom React hook that provides mock translation functionality with history tracking, supporting common phrases like greetings and thanks across 12 languages.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and saving user profiles via the actor backend, with toast notifications and cache invalidation on successful updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useVideoSearch.ts: Custom React hook that provides mock video search functionality using publicly available sample videos from Google Cloud Storage, returning video metadata including URLs, thumbnails, and durations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a dark educational theme with teal primary colors, coral accents, sidebar styling, and webkit-specific browser compatibility prefixes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function that combines clsx and tailwind-merge to merge Tailwind CSS class names with proper conflict resolution.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/templates/flappyBirdTemplat: Complete HTML template string for a Flappy Bird game implementation with canvas rendering, bird physics, pipe generation, scoring, and game over functionality.
frontend/src/utils/errorLogger.ts: Error logging utility class that maintains a circular buffer of log entries with severity levels (info, warning, error, critical) and outputs to console with appropriate methods.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, container settings, border radius variables, shadows, and keyframe animations for UI components.
project_state.json: Project state file documenting Nexora AI media generator app features, including web-based image and video search functionality without API key requirements.
